title: Hint
text: Use the equations of motion and kinematic equations to calculate the velocity, acceleration, and average force of the fireworks shell.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Calculate the initial velocity of the shell using the given height and the equations of motion. Step 2: Use the kinematic equation to find the average acceleration of the shell in the tube. Step 3: Calculate the average force on the shell using Newton's second law. Step 4: Clearly show all calculations and units.
